Field Documentation

ZCL_CommandId_t _ZclTransferDataErrorCommand_t::id

The command identifier must be:

  • TRANSFER_DATA_ERROR_SERVER_COMMAND_ID or
  • TRANSFER_DATA_ERROR_CLIENT_COMMAND_ID.
